select id, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, type, status, create_time, update_time from t_ele_ota_upgrade limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_ele_ota_upgrade(electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, type, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{electricityCabinetId}, #{cellNo}, #{type}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
